00025 /*! \file MAS5CHPUtils.h Defines a class to assist with writing a MAS5 CHP file. */

00037 /*! Provides utilities for writing MAS5 CHP files. */
00038 class MAS5CHPUtils
00039 {
00040 private:
00041 
00042         /*! The command console CHP data object. */
00043         affymetrix_calvin_io::CHPData *cc_data;
00044 
00045         /*! The GCOS CHP data object. */
00046         affxchpwriter::CCHPFileWriter *gcos_data;

00048         /*! The algorithm results. */
00049         CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation *mas5_data;
00050

00052         ExpressionReport::ExpressionProbeSetReporter *report_data;
00053 
00054     /*! The program name. */
00055     std::wstring programName;
00056     
00057     /*! The company name. */
00058     std::wstring programCompany;
00059     
00060     /*! The ID of the program. */
00061     std::wstring programId;
00062 
00063         /*! Add a name/value pair to the algorithm parameter section.
00064          * @param name The parameter name.
00065          * @param value The parameter value.
00066          */
00067         void AddAlgParam(const std::wstring &name, const std::wstring &value);
00068 
00069         /*! Add a name/value pair to the algorithm parameter section.
00070          * @param name The parameter name.
00071          * @param value The parameter value.
00072          */
00073         void AddAlgParam(const std::wstring &name, int value);
00074 
00075         /*! Add a name/value pair to the algorithm parameter section.
00076          * @param name The parameter name.
00077          * @param value The parameter value.
00078          */
00079         void AddAlgParam(const std::wstring &name, float value);
00080 
00081         /*! Add a name/value pair to the chip summary section.
00082          * @param name The parameter name.
00083          * @param value The parameter value.
00084          */
00085         void AddChipSum(const std::wstring &name, const std::wstring &value);
00086 
00087         /*! Add a name/value pair to the chip summary section.
00088          * @param name The parameter name.
00089          * @param value The parameter value.
00090          */
00091         void AddChipSum(const std::wstring &name, float value);
00092

00094          * @param name The parameter name.
00095          * @param value The parameter value.
00096          */
00097         void AddChipSum(const std::wstring &name, int value);
00098 
00099         /*! Store program information. */
00100         void StoreProgramInfo();
00101 
00102         /*! Store the algorithm parameters to the chp object. */
00103         void StoreAlgParams();
00104 
00105         /*! Store the summary parameters to the chp object.
00106      * @param separateEntries True if the average, stdv, min and max values are to be stored in separate parameters.
00107      */
00108         void StoreSummaryParams(bool separateEntries);
00109

00111         void StoreReport();
00112

00114         void StoreReportParameters();

00117         void StoreReportDetectionStats();
00118

00120         void StoreReportControlStats();
00121

00123         void StoreReportChangeStats();
00124

00126          * @param controlType A string describing the type of control - Spike or housekeeping.
00127          * @param result The control results.
00128          */
00129         void StoreReportControlStat(const wchar_t *controlType,

00131

00133         void StoreParentHeaders();

00136          * @param schpFile The name of the output CHP file.
00137          * @return True if successful.
00138          */
00139         bool SaveCommandConsoleCHPFile(const std::string &schpFile);

00142          * @param schpFile The name of the output CHP file.

00145         bool SaveGCOSCHPFile(const std::string &schpFile);

00155      * @param id The identifier of the program.

00157     void SetProgramInformation(const std::wstring &name, const std::wstring &co, const std::wstring &id); 
00158

00160         void Clear();

00163          * @param schpFile The name of the output CHP file.
00164          * @param exp The MAS5 results object.
00165          * @param report The report results.
00166          * @param reportPass True if the report has results.
00167          * @param saveToLegacyFile True is saving to older CHP file format.
00168          * @return True if successful.
00169          */
00170         bool SaveCHPFile(const std::string &chpFile, CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation &exp, ExpressionReport::ExpressionProbeSetReporter &report, bool reportPass, bool saveToLegacyFile);
